name: Morituri Te Salutant
summary: It's time to test your mettle in a Grecco-Roman-ish single adventure map, Morituri Te Salutant! Doomguy has found himself summoned to an ancient, crumbling villa - the court of the Red Emperor. The Emperor is conspicuously absent, but he and his cronies watch with great interest from afar as you rip and tear your way through his tests. Will you make it through the trials, or will you be split from nose to navel? Play and find out.
